meanings.definition: The art of knotting cords into patterns.
meanings.sent1: She learned macrame from her grandmother and now creates beautiful wall hangings.
meanings.sent2: The macrame plant hanger added a touch of bohemian style to the room.
meanings.sent3: When the cat got tangled in the macrame, it looked like a furry knot monster.
meanings.sent4: The intricate macrame design resembled a spider's web, delicate and precise.
meanings.sent5: The art show featured a stunning macrame display that left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: A piece of decorative work made by knotting cords.
meanings.sent1: The macrame bracelet she wore was a gift from her best friend.
meanings.sent2: The macrame table runner added a touch of elegance to the dining room.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally spilled spaghetti sauce on the white macrame tablecloth, creating a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The macrame wall hanging swayed gently in the breeze, like a dance of knots.
meanings.sent5: The intricate macrame design on the pillow gave the room a cozy feel.
